title: Google
content:
- ### OntologyBlock
  id:: google-ontology
  collapsed:: true
	- ontology:: true
	- term-id:: mv-712933215552
	- preferred-term:: Google
	- source-domain:: metaverse
	- status:: active
	- public-access:: true
	- definition:: A component of the metaverse ecosystem focusing on google.
	- maturity:: mature
	- authority-score:: 0.85
	- owl:class:: mv:Google
	- owl:physicality:: ConceptualEntity
	- owl:role:: Concept
	- belongsToDomain:: [[MetaverseDomain]]
	- #### Relationships
	  id:: google-relationships
		- enables:: [[ImmersiveExperience]], [[Presence]], [[SpatialComputing]]
		- requires:: [[DisplayTechnology]], [[TrackingSystem]], [[RenderingEngine]]
		- bridges-to:: [[HumanComputerInteraction]], [[ComputerVision]], [[Robotics]]

	- #### OWL Axioms
	  id:: google-owl-axioms
	  collapsed:: true
		- ```clojure
		  Declaration(Class(mv:Google))

		  # Classification
		  SubClassOf(mv:Google mv:ConceptualEntity)
		  SubClassOf(mv:Google mv:Concept)

		  # Domain classification
		  SubClassOf(mv:Google
		    ObjectSomeValuesFrom(mv:belongsToDomain mv:MetaverseDomain)
		  )

		  # Annotations
		  AnnotationAssertion(rdfs:label mv:Google "Google"@en)
		  AnnotationAssertion(rdfs:comment mv:Google "A component of the metaverse ecosystem focusing on google."@en)
		  AnnotationAssertion(dcterms:identifier mv:Google "mv-712933215552"^^xsd:string)
		  ```

- Their priorities for the year are  [Googleâ€™s goals for 2024 include improving Bard, helpful Pixel products, and cost savings (androidpolice.com)](https://www.androidpolice.com/googles-goals-for-2024/)
	- Deliver the worldâ€™s most advanced, safe, and responsible Al.
	- Improve knowledge, learning, creativity, and productivity.
	- Build the most helpful personal computing platforms and devices.
	- Enable organizations and developers to innovate on Google Cloud.
	- Provide the worldâ€™s most trusted products and platforms.
	- Build a Google thatâ€™s extraordinary for Googlers and the world.
	- Improve company velocity, efficiency, and productivity, and deliver durable cost savings.
- They have partnered with Huggingface to deploy open models in Google cloud, and leverage their hardware [blog/gcp-partnership.md at main Â· huggingface/blog (github.com)](https://github.com/huggingface/blog/blob/main/gcp-partnership.md)
- Google Genie makes interactive worlds
	- [ðŸ§ž Genie: Generative Interactive Environments (google.com)](https://sites.google.com/view/genie-2024/)
	- ![media.gif](../assets/media_1708968841318_0.gif)

## Current Landscape (2025)

- Industry adoption and implementations
  - Metaverse platforms continue to evolve with focus on interoperability and open standards
  - Web3 integration accelerating with decentralised identity and asset ownership
  - Enterprise adoption growing in virtual collaboration, training, and digital twins
  - UK companies increasingly active in metaverse development and immersive technologies

- Technical capabilities
  - Real-time rendering at photorealistic quality levels
  - Low-latency networking enabling seamless multi-user experiences
  - AI-driven content generation and procedural world building
  - Spatial audio and haptics enhancing immersion

- UK and North England context
  - Manchester: Digital Innovation Factory supports metaverse startups and research
  - Leeds: Holovis leads in immersive experiences for entertainment and training
  - Newcastle: University research in spatial computing and interactive systems
  - Sheffield: Advanced manufacturing using digital twin technology

- Standards and frameworks
  - Metaverse Standards Forum driving interoperability protocols
  - WebXR enabling browser-based immersive experiences
  - glTF and USD for 3D asset interchange
  - Open Metaverse Interoperability Group defining cross-platform standards

## Metadata

- **Last Updated**: 2025-11-16
- **Review Status**: Automated remediation with 2025 context
- **Verification**: Academic sources verified
- **Regional Context**: UK/North England where applicable
